name: CATSTRIKE
description:
PRESS P FOR PHOTO MODE:

Lets you run around taking sexy screenshots!

HOW HARD DID WE WORK?

51+ Animations, 128 custom models, 5 main full feature length songs, 52 custom sounds, and so much more content you cant even imagine!

OBJECTIVES:

Find the console, power down the space ships so that they dont make it to earth. Once you are finish, fly back down to earth!

FEATURES:

The game has DIRECT CONNECT multiplayer enabled. You can type your name on the main menu (for the host) and then have everybody else do it on the join screen. It saves the last three connections for a quick info.

There are four primary classes to the game, however some movement and other skills are shared across all classes.

W, A, S, D - Movement
LShift - Sprint
LMB - Fire/Attack (tank)
RMB - Secondary Attack/Shield (tank)
E - Interact with obects/Revive downed team members
Q - Special Skill
ESC - Brings up ESC menu
